text: for. Rental rates The daily price of the car itself will likely be your biggest expense. Costs vary by car size, location and season. For a small economy car, you might pay around 30 to 65 CHF per day in base rental rate, whereas a midsize sedan can be around 70 to 120 CHF per day. Luxury vehicles or SUVs can range anywhere from 150 up to 200+ CHF per day in high season. Prices in peak summer (July-August) are highest, while in off-season months you could find rates 20 to 30% lower. One-way rentals , where you pick up your car in one city and drop it off in another, often incur an extra fee. Sometimes around 50 to 100 CHF within Switzerland, more if cross-border. Also note, airport rentals might include a slight surcharge, around 10 to 15 CHF extra for the convenience.
